dcterms:description: The Ninapro DB2 dataset includes sEMG data collected from 12 electrodes placed on the right forearm of 40 intact subjects, capturing 17 hand movements through 8 isometric and isotonic hand configurations. Each movement was repeated 6 times, with a total sampling duration of over 500 seconds for each subject.
dcterms:title: Ninapro DB2
